name: HoplàCare
description:
The Booking.com of trusted Carers, a unified marketplace that makes domiciliary HealthCare services bookable online within 3 minutes.

HoplàCare allows a quick and effective matching between the demand and the supply of all kind of Home Care services for the older and disabled persons.

team.name: Nicola Fratini
team.bioHtml: Founder at CaringMate, Phd in Engineering at "La Sapienza" University of Rome, strong business/entrepreneurship background.

jobs.title: Health Care Expert
jobs.description:
We are looking for a freelance high-skilled health care expert, with experience in healthcare businesses and regulatory, London based, available to join the HoplàCare team. 
CaringMate Ltd is going to submit his new project HoplàCare to the EC in February. Only in case of success, your responsibilities will be:
- Recommend best practice solutions and assist in implementation of recommendations for care providers
- Review documentation and procedures to assure compliance with regulatory and government requirements for care providers
- Review regulatory for healthcare service transaction (billing, invoicing, taxes, claims) and liability insurance. Please only London based, no remote working, no agencies.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description: We are looking for a freelance high-skilled software engineer, London based, available to join the HoplàCare team. CaringMate Ltd is going to submit his new project HoplàCare to the EC in February. Only in case of success, you'll be in charge of a distributed team of web programmers and app (iOs and Android) developers. You'll be responsible for the release of a full operational Beta of the web site and of the app for the project HoplàCare. Please, only London based, no remote working, no employment agencies, no companies.

jobs.title: Marketing manager
jobs.description: We are looking for a freelance high-skilled web marketing expert, London based, available to join the HoplàCare team. CaringMate Ltd is going to submit his new project HoplàCare to the EC in February. Only in case of success, you'll be involved in all the aspects related to marketing activities. Your main responsability will be fostering the launch of HoplàCare and establishing our brand into the UK market. Please, only London based, no remote working, no employment agencies, no companies.
